title: The frog prince?
caption: The frog prince?
desc: Perched among the petals of a purple water lily, this little green tree frog is a common pet in parts of the US, where it can be found in backyards and has been named the official state reptile of both Louisiana and Georgia. Its small size, friendly face and low-maintenance lifestyle make it a popular choice with frog lovers.
